title: Task 39

question.text: Why was Sarah looking at the code, and what did she think was the reason for the problem?

answers.answer: To update it, because it was old.
answers.feedback: Sarah was searching for errors, not updating old code.

answers.answer: To write about it, thinking there was a mistake in writing.
answers.feedback: She was searching for problems in the code, not writing about it.

answers.answer: To teach coding, because she found a good example.
answers.feedback: Sarah was trying to find a problem, not teach coding.

answers.answer: To find errors, thinking new changes caused the problem.

dialogue.text: Well, I was investigating the code when I saw that the problem might be related to the recent updates.

description: Listen to the audio and answer the question.
